caption.p: Correlation between morphological characteristics and climatic data. ( A) Seed length. ( B) Seed width. ( C) Seed coat. ( D) Weight of megagametophyte. ( E) Length of megagametophyte correlated whit the mean monthly maximum temperature. ( F) Perimeter of megagametophyte correlated with the mean monthly minimum temperature. Pearson’s correlation coefficient is indicated with a level of significance ( p ≤ 0.05). Population names are indicated in Table 4.
